attributes.additional_details: A referendum allows the voice of the public to be heard directly on an issue that deeply affects individuals and families. Assisted dying is a profoundly personal matter, and decisions regarding it should reflect the values and beliefs of the society as a whole. Engaging the public through a referendum reinforces the democratic process.
attributes.background: I would like any changes to the law on assisted dying to be held as a referendum, as I believe it is too important for this to be decided in parliament alone.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action: 

We are petitioning for a National Referendum on Assisted Dying 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701838
